bibl.title: Theophrastus, Characters: The New Papyrus. "Philologias LA".
bibl.note: Text of the Thirty-First Character of Theophrastus, dealing with Classical Philologist, as discovered by C. Cichorius in the famous Nirgendländische Stadtsbibliothek and added to Theophrastus' Characters (Leipzig, 1897). Submitted by M.M. April 1. - Cf. Idem, ZivaAnt 1976.
bibl.seg: Marcovich Miroslav, Theophrastus, Characters: The New Papyrus. "Philologias LA".

Text of the Thirty-First Character of Theophrastus, dealing with Classical Philologist, as discovered by C. Cichorius in the famous Nirgendländische Stadtsbibliothek and added to Theophrastus' Characters (Leipzig, 1897). Submitted by M.M. April 1. - Cf. Idem, ZivaAnt 1976.
